Welcome to Bharat Jyoti

At Bharat Jyoti, we are dedicated to fostering social security, protecting vulnerable populations, and promoting holistic development through various initiatives.

About us

At Bharat Jyoti our mission is to foster social security and combat social injustices by championing the rights and welfare of vulnerable populations. We are dedicated to providing legal aid to economically disadvantaged individuals, protecting the elderly, women, and children, and empowering marginalized communities. Driven by the principles of public interest and moral development, we strive to meet the diverse needs of society through comprehensive programs. Our initiatives encompass employment-oriented education, vocational training, cultural programs, and sports activities to promote holistic development.

Our Gallery

Our Projects

1. Help to Helpless People

  • Training for disabled kids in handicrafts and skill development
  • Providing education to underprivileged and backward class children
  • Supporting elderly people with regular supplies
  • Conducting medical campaigns in rural areas
  • Organizing mental health awareness campaigns

2. Jharkhand Kanuni Sahayata Kendra

  • Providing free legal services to women and those in need through legal camps

3. Skill Development Programme

  • Mushroom cultivation
  • Tailoring
  • Beautician training
  • Candle making
  • Computer learning
  • Driving lessons
  • Bamboo craft
  • Jute craft
  • Fish cultivation
  • Goat Cultivation
  • Kitchen garden setup
  • Agriculture-related training
  • Handloom training
  • Bangle making

4. Awareness Programmes

  • Sanitary awareness
  • Yoga awareness programmes
  • Ped Lagao Ped Bachao (Tree plantation and conservation)
  • Mental health awareness
  • Safety awareness
  • Violence prevention initiatives
  • Women & child welfare programmes
  • Natural & Environmental Disaster preparedness
  • Health awareness campaigns

Our Vission

Facilitate the initiation of sustainable transformations in the lives of underprivileged children and families through a comprehensive developmental approach spanning their entire life journey.

Embrace exemplary governance practices to establish ourselves as a pioneering institution in knowledge and technology-driven innovation, with the ability to scale our development initiatives effectively.

Serve as a vocal champion for the rights and needs of women, children, and the marginalized, amplifying their voices and mobilizing support at all levels to enact positive change and foster a more inclusive and equitable society.

Empower global civil society to actively participate in driving change through the ethos of community-led transformation.
